</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes called liquid persuasion, this sweet-tasting tincture induces euphoria that lowers inhibitions and increases trust. The status penalty from being [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) due to this poison doubles when applied to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47), Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85), and Perception DCs to detect a Lie.

 **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 10 minutes; **Stage 1** stupefied 1 (1 minute); **Stage 2** stupefied 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** stupefied 3, and the victim's attitude toward others improves by one step (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
